name: Mecha Fury
description:
Somewhere in the depths of a secret research facility a disaffected employee logs onto a disused terminal and uploads something to the Mechas A.I. core. Minutes latter the machine is on the move, destroying everything in it's wake.

An Endless Runner full of chaos and destruction. How high can you get your score?
To see more form us and get access to betas freebies and more, come support us on Patreon. https://www.patreon.com/Giantess_Arcade
